predicate.note: Frames file for 'deposit' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Placing.

example.name: all args
example.text: But judges usually find the real aim is to escape tax on hidden income; and the IRS said Brown must have had such income -- although it uncovered no source -- because he deposited $124,732 in a bank account in 1982-84 while reporting income of only $52,012.

example.name: missing destination
example.text: Employers must deposit withholding taxes exceeding $3,000 within three days after payroll -- or pay stiff penalties -- and that's a big problem for small businesses.
